Package com.jbq2.simplebankapi.endpoints.authenticated_accessible.user.update_profile_page

Class UpdateProfileService

java.lang.Object
com.jbq2.simplebankapi.endpoints.authenticated_accessible.user.update_profile_page.UpdateProfileService
@Service public class UpdateProfileService extends Object
Service class that performs business logic to validate and process the request to update a user's profile.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Joshua Quizon

      bCryptPasswordEncoder - Encrypts strings using the BCrypt algorithm.
      jwtConstants - Provides static variables for decoding JSON web tokens.

  • Method Details

    • getPageContent

      public String getPageContent(String jwt)
      Checks for the JSON web token's validity to return page content.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The user's JSON web token.
      Returns:
      If the JSON web token is valid, the email of the web token is returned.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Throws a RuntimeException if the verify() method throws its Exception.

    • updateProfile

      public String updateProfile(UpdateProfileForm updateProfileForm)
      Validates the update profile form inputs and then applies the update use the UserService object.
      Parameters:
      updateProfileForm - Contains the information the user entered as well as the user's old information.
      Returns:
      Returns the user's updated email address.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Throws a RuntimeException if the form fields are invalid or if the new email already exists in the database.
